about_the_game:
The Haydee II soundtrack features 20 minutes of music that will allow you to immerse yourself in the dangerous world of the game and hear stories hidden from your eyes. Each track, in its own way, will help you learn more about the mysterious complex, from where you will risk to get out together with the main character.

This epic blend of orchestra, electronics, atmospheric post-rock guitars, and piano melodies will become a guide and ally in your upcoming journey.

All tracks were composed and produced by Vlad Plotnikov (VP Production). Files are available in MP3 320 kbps as well as in FLAC format.

name: Haydee 2 Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 110 MB available space
